description: The star of Ame no Kisaki due to her tall stature, good looks, kindness, and generally tomboyish nature. She has a great number of fans and her own fan club. She was supposed to be Kanako`s roommate at the dormitories only to be run out by Mariya later so that Mariya could keep a close eye on Kanako. Ryuuken`s fans cause mischief for Kanako because they are jealous of her friendship with Ryuuken.
name: Ishima Ryuuken
